A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
In terms of production value and cinematography\, it's a good film. But\, for the record\, if you can't guarantee these\, you shouldn't be allowed near a Star Wars film.

As far as plot\, story and character definition\, it's utter GARBAGE. Plus\, it completely craps on Luke Skywalker's legacy.

One last point:

Luke\, Han\, Leia and all the other characters from the OT\, gave Star Wars it's power. These new characters\, especially those introduced in The Last Jedi\, need the Star Wars logo to matter.
